data: Restricted to Department of Allergy and Immunology
Designated allergist to discuss allergy testing and document in history notes prior to administration of skin test
Medications for anaphylaxis management must be available on the unit
once, prior to allergy skin test

After allergy skin test, observe for any signs of anaphylaxis or urticaria
Pharmacy to supply allergy skin test reagents. Provider to contact pharmacy regarding pick-up/delivery time and location
